docs.lead_paragraph: In their final debate before the Iowa caucuses, the gloves came off between Hillary Clinton and Bernie Sanders.

headline.main: Debate Takeaways: Gloves Come Off Between Clinton, Sanders
headline.print_headline: Debate Takeaways: Gloves Come Off Between Clinton, Sanders

docs.snippet: In their final debate before the Iowa caucuses, the gloves came off between Hillary Clinton and Bernie Sanders.

docs.lead_paragraph: Bernie Sanders airbrushed the complexities of trying to overhaul health care all over again and Hillary Clinton offered a selective reading of her rival's record on gun control in the latest Democratic presidential debate.

headline.main: AP FACT CHECK: Democratic Debaters and the Facts
headline.print_headline: AP FACT CHECK: Democratic Debaters and the Facts

docs.snippet: Bernie Sanders airbrushed the complexities of trying to overhaul health care all over again and Hillary Clinton offered a selective reading of her rival's record on gun control in the latest Democratic presidential debate.

headline.main: Bernie Sanders Releases Details on Health Plan That Would Raise Taxes but, He Argues, Save on Costs
headline.print_headline: Sanders’s Health Plan Would Raise Taxes but, He Argues, Save on Costs for Care

docs.abstract: Mr. Sanders, under pressure from the Clinton campaign to explain how he would pay for his progressive policies, unveiled a universal healthcare plan on Sunday night that includes sweeping tax increases and a drastic tax hike for the wealthiest.
docs.snippet: Mr. Sanders, under pressure from the Clinton campaign to explain how he would pay for his progressive policies, unveiled a universal healthcare plan on Sunday night that includes sweeping tax increases and a drastic tax hike for the wealthiest.

byline.original: By YAMICHE ALCINDOR and ALAN RAPPEPORT

docs.lead_paragraph: Here are the latest developments from the Democratic presidential candidates' final debate before the Feb. 1 Iowa caucuses.

headline.main: The Latest: Updates From the Democratic Presidential Debate
headline.print_headline: The Latest: Updates From the Democratic Presidential Debate

docs.snippet: Here are the latest developments from the Democratic presidential candidates' final debate before the Feb. 1 Iowa caucuses.

docs.lead_paragraph: Vowing to achieve universal health care, Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders released a sweeping proposal hours before Sunday's Democratic presidential debate to create a new single-payer health care system in the United States paid for with a variety of widespread tax increases.

headline.main: Sanders Proposes Tax Hike to Pay for Universal Health Care
headline.print_headline: Sanders Proposes Tax Hike to Pay for Universal Health Care

docs.snippet: Vowing to achieve universal health care, Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders released a sweeping proposal hours before Sunday's Democratic presidential debate to create a new single-payer health care system in the United States paid for with a variety of...

docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic White House contender Bernie Sanders put front-runner Hillary Clinton on the defensive at a debate on Sunday, criticizing her for accepting speaking fees from Wall Street investors and sparring with her over healthcare.

headline.main: Sanders Lashes Out at Clinton in Last Democratic Debate Before Iowa Contest
headline.print_headline: Sanders Lashes Out at Clinton in Last Democratic Debate Before Iowa Contest

docs.snippet: Democratic White House contender Bernie Sanders put front-runner Hillary Clinton on the defensive at a debate on Sunday, criticizing her for accepting speaking fees from Wall Street investors and sparring with her over healthcare.

docs.lead_paragraph: In new guidelines, the Obama administration says doctors and hospitals cannot require patients to state a reason for requesting their records, and cannot deny access out of a general concern that patients might be upset by the information.

headline.main: New Guidelines Nudge Doctors to Give Patients Access to Medical Records
headline.print_headline: New Guidelines Nudge Doctors on Giving Patients Access to Medical Records

docs.snippet: In new guidelines, the Obama administration says doctors and hospitals cannot require patients to state a reason for requesting their records, and cannot deny access out of a general concern that patients might be upset by the information.

docs.lead_paragraph: Performance metrics in medicine and education are increasingly getting in the way of quality.

headline.main: How Measurement Fails Doctors and Teachers

docs.snippet: Performance metrics in medicine and education are increasingly getting in the way of quality.

docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton’s campaign denounced an ad for Bernie Sanders in Iowa and New Hampshire, calling it a negative attack — a characterization Mr. Sanders’s team denied.

headline.main: Bernie Sanders’s Vision Makes Hillary Clinton Camp See Red
headline.print_headline: Sanders’s Vision Makes Clinton Team See Red

docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton’s campaign denounced an ad for Bernie Sanders in Iowa and New Hampshire, calling it a negative attack — a characterization Mr. Sanders’s team denied.

docs.lead_paragraph: In “Portraying Artists: Photographs by Walter Weissman,” on view through Feb. 21, Mr. Weissman captures celebrities from a fly-on-the-wall perspective.
